DOC.brief_summary: The study hypotheasis is that curcumin, a natural compound with a potent antiproliferative effect, can improve the efficacy of the standard chemotherapy gemcitabine in patients with advanced pancreatic cancer. That is why the patients are given a daily oral dose of 8 gr of curcumin along the chemotherapeutic protocol of weekly gemcitabine.
DOC.brief_title: Gemcitabine With Curcumin for Pancreatic Cancer
DOC.criteria: locally advanced or metastatic adenocarcinoma of the pancreas no prior chemotherapy performance status 02 adequate hematology and chemistry serious concurrent medical condition
